live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63213.summary: Some customers in the South Central area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63213.title: June 27 - Kelowna (South Central) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 12:47 CT.

63254.title: June 28 - West Saint Paul | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
